conbody.codeblock: s.eVar7="D=pageName" // captures the pageName value in eVar7
s.prop5=s.eVar5="D=g" // passes the page URL into both prop5 and eVar5
s.eVar20="D=v0" // captures the campaign in eVar20
conbody.p: Note that the D=[variable] value should be in quotes. The code treats this as a string. The string will be URL encoded when passed into (as you will see if viewing the request in the DigitalPulse Debugger or a similar utility). This is normal. Adobe's servers recognize the D=[variable] construction and will copy the appropriate value when they encounter this string.
